name: Breaking Umberlee's Resolve
description: The search for a missing young woman kicks off a treacherous journey on the *Sea of Fallen Stars*.

storyAwards.name: Zehira’s Allyship
storyAwards.description: As a thanks for freeing her from the morkoth lair, Zehira becomes a staunch ally of the characters. She boldly assumes command of Umberlee’s Resolve. Upon return to Turmish, she makes amends with her parents and takes on the role of a privateer captain sailing under the flag of Turmish. She accompanies the characters on the next adventure.

name: Blood in the Water
description: An exploration to the underwater city of Myth Nantar leads to a conspiracy, a mystery, and a heist.

storyAwards.name: Thessalia’s Allyship
storyAwards.description: Helping Thessalia retrieve the bowl of commanding water elementals earns them her allyship. Thessalia is less of a fighter and more of a scholar, but she gladly helps research topics that aid in their quest. Like Zehira, Thessalia is proudly Turmish and wants to keep her homeland free from Thay.

name: Saving Silverbeard
description: Powerful elements collide in the wake of the attack on Myth Nantar. The conclusion to the haunting sea-faring tale on the *Sea of Fallen Stars*.

storyAwards.name: Turmish Hospitality
storyAwards.description: As a thanks for their aid in uncovering the Thayan plot, Turmish become a safe harbor for the characters, and they are always offered a place to stay. Zehira remains a friend to the party.

name: Foreign Affairs
description: An invitation to the storm giant court of King Hekaton becomes a continent-spanning mystery that could change the face of Faerûn. Part One of the *Storm King’s Descent* series of adventures.

storyAwards.name: Ally of the Zulkir
storyAwards.description: You have agreed to work with the Thayan zulkir of enchantment, Dar’lon Ma.

storyAwards.name: A Costly Ride
storyAwards.description: You offered a favor to the wizard Khynree and passed up a chance to repay that debt. Since you refused him once, your debt has grown. To clear your debt, Khynree requires that you forfeit a common or rarer permanent magic item or a rare or rarer consumable magic item.

name: Uncertain Scrutiny
description: In search of King Hekaton, you must enter the dread land of Thay—but getting in will prove less difficult than getting out. Part Two of the *Storm King’s Descent* series of adventures.

items.name: Spell Scroll of Mass Cure Wounds

storyAwards.name: Liberator
storyAwards.description: You rescued the Thayan political prisoner Trildor Zihial from the dungeons beneath the Citadel, and he survived to tell the tale. He owes you his life and swears to dedicate his freedom to continuing to oppose Szass Tam’s tyrannical rule over Thay.

name: Assault on Myth Nantar
description: Thay has set it sights on taking the underwater city of Myth Nantar. Can you stop a full-on invasion by its undead armada, or will the elves be looking for a new home?
